title: Random client crash with Dynamic Que
body: Recently my client has been crashing at random times when the players are loaded into their dynamic que positions and sometimes the UI shows no icons and it in return i believe crashes my game (It made me take a loss in my provisional and ended it >:C) But any ideas if this is just my client or not

replies.body: I had some client crashes in my ranked game attemting to reconnect for more then 2 min ......i exited the game and after that no match in progress and i lost 24LP twice this week-end so its a bit disappointing i have a 100 download 100mb upload i do not think that is the connection to the server

There are a few things that could be causing this. The most likely based on your description is that your client has a poor connection to the servers. I recommend working through our [network guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in its entirety to ensure your local settings are 100% good.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
